name: FamilyInstance
description: The FamilyInstance class represents an instance of a family in a Revit project.

properties.name: Symbol
properties.description: Gets or sets the family symbol.

properties.name: Room
properties.description: Gets the room that contains the instance.

properties.name: Space
properties.description: Gets the space that contains the instance.

methods.name: GetTransform()
methods.description: Gets the transform of the instance.

methods.name: GetTypeId()
methods.description: Gets the type ID of the instance.

methods.name: MoveWithHost(ElementId, ElementId)
methods.description: Moves the instance with its host.
